Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Reroute at Cermak/Archer

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Archer, Canal and Cermak due to, street blockage near Cermak/Archer.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute at Narragansett/Cortland

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: Temporary Westbound #55 Garfield Reroute near Garfield/Princeton
ShortDescription: Westbound 55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted near Garfield/Princeton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via Garfield, Princeton, 51st, Halsted, Garfield and resume to normal route, due to street blockage near Garfield/Princeton.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line No trains between 63rd/Cottage Grove and Garfield
ShortDescription: Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between 63rd/Cottage Grove and Garfield due to track switching problems near the area of 59th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between 63rd/Cottage Grove and Garfield due to track switching problems near the area of 59th.

As a result, trains are operating only between 63rd/Ashland and Harlem at this time.

Shuttle buses have been requested from 63rd/Cottage Grove and Garfield to provide connecting service through the affected area. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
